casebody.data:
Clifford Leon LEE, II, Plaintiff,
v.
COUNTY OF CUMBERLAND, a political Subdivision of the State of North Carolina, Angela Campbell, Deputy Woody Pait, Deputy XI, Deputy XII, Sheriff Earl Butler, in his capacity of holding the Office of Sheriff of Cumberland County, North Carolina, S. McLaurin, in her capacity as Chief Magistrate of Cumberland County, et al., Defendants. No. COA17-446 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: February 6, 2018

AFFIRMED.
